header.title: Hello, here are some of details about myself.
header.summary: Hi, I'm Michael, a 29-year-old computer science graduate with a passion for front-end development and a touch of back-end experience. I love styling websites and components, believing that front-end development is where creativity and open-mindedness truly shine. It's fascinating how something that looks great in design tools like Figma or Zeplin can differ once it's on a user's display, and I enjoy navigating these challenges to create beautiful, functional interfaces. In my free time, I love watching movies, playing PC games, meeting friends, and reading books. Now that I've completed my degree, I have more time to indulge in these hobbies. While I have a strong passion for front-end development, I'm open-minded and interested in exploring various job opportunities. opportunities where I can express myself and contribute to innovative projects.
header.skills: Skills - React, Redux, Routers, Hooks, Type Script.
header.education: Education - Bsc in computer, OOP, C, Linux, Python and SQL.
header.hobbies: Hobbies - PC Games, Netflix, Friends, Books.
